function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of reporting on coinfection and co-morbidity in existing disease distribution systems","Impact":"Inability to identify and address multiple diseases and conditions in communities","Mitigation":"Expand reporting to include coinfection and co-morbidity data","Technologies":"Enhanced reporting systems, data analysis tools","People":"Communities with multiple diseases, health planners","Owner":"Health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Limitations of detail in existing HDSS data due to lack of extensive laboratory assessment","Impact":"Inability to accurately understand disease prevalence and composition in communities","Mitigation":"Invest in laboratory assessment of stool and blood samples, Improve data quality","Technologies":"Laboratory testing equipment, data quality management tools","People":"Health researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Health authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Performance scrutiny and contextual factors influencing community health workers","Impact":"Inaccurate or incomplete understanding of community health situations and needs","Mitigation":"Listen to and learn from community health workers, address contextual factors influencing their work","Technologies":"Community health data collection tools, contextual analysis software","People":"Community health workers, project managers","Owner":"Health authorities, research institutions"}]}
